sources.name: Src_Mstr
sources.script:
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		Name as string,
		Salary as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Src_Mstr

sources.name: Src_Dtl
sources.script:
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		Designation as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Src_Dtl

sinks.name: OLEDBDestination
sinks.script:
MergeJoin sink(mapColumn(
		Designation,
		ID,
		Name,
		Salary
	)) ~> OLEDBDestination

transformations.name: MergeJoin
transformations.script:
Src_Sort,Dtl_Sort join(Src_Mstr@ID == Src_Dtl@ID,
 joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin
